scoringPlays.text: Terry Wilson 1 Yd Run (Miles Butler Kick)
Asim Rose 24 Yd Run (Miles Butler Kick)
Benny Snell Jr. 4 Yd Run (Miles Butler Kick)
Deebo Samuel 58 Yd pass from Jake Bentley (Parker White Kick)

videos.headline: South Carolina's fumble leads to a Wildcats FG
videos.description: Rico Dowdle fumbles on the Gamecocks' 7-yard line and is recovered by the Wildcats' Kent Jordan  Jones.

videos.headline: Wilson holds on and runs in a 1-yard TD
videos.description: In a RPO play, Wildcats' QB Terry Wilson keeps the ball and runs it in for a 1-yard touchdown for a 10-3 Kentucky lead.

videos.headline: Rose scores 24-yard Kentucky TD
videos.description: Kentucky's Asim Rose breaks a tackle and runs for 24-yard touchdown.

videos.headline: Bentley gets picked off by Kentucky's Baity
videos.description: South Carolina QB Jake Bentley avoids two defenders, but is intercepted by Kentucky's Derrick Baity Jr.

videos.headline: Snell spins and scores a 4-yard TD
videos.description: Kentucky's Benny Snell Jr. spins out of a tackle and runs in for a 4-yard touchdown.

videos.headline: Bentley throws 58-yard TD
videos.description: South Carolina's Jake Bentley connects with Deebo Samuel for 58-yard touchdown.

videos.headline: Kentucky's Daniel ejected for targeting
videos.description: After a Kentucky interception, LB Kash Daniel is ejected for targeting on a late block.

videos.headline: Bentley throws 3rd INT
videos.description: Injured and hopping on his back foot, South Carolina quarterback Jake Bentley's pass is intercepted by Kentucky's Mike Edwards.
